column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service

There was a very small yarding of cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with most being cows.
All met a stronger market with yearlings making 312c to 328c while heavy beef cows selling for 288c to 304c, leaner 262c to 292c and very light store cows 50c to 110c/kg.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
